text.section: The Governor shall appoint the chairman of the Board.
A majority of the authorized membership of the Board is a quorum.

At the times and places that it determines, the Board:
Shall meet at least twice a year; and
Subject to the call by the chairman or by request of a majority of the members of the Board, may meet more frequently as deemed necessary.

A member of the Board:
May not receive compensation; but
Is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
